mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu(id, pid, url, permissions, type, open_style, icon, sort, creator, create_date, updater, update_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{pid}, #{url}, #{permissions}, #{type}, 0, #{icon}, #{sort}, 1067246875800000001, #{now}, 1067246875800000001, #{now})
INSERT INTO sys_language(table_name, table_id, field_name, field_value, language) VALUES ('sys_menu', #{id}, 'name', #{name}, #{language})
